description: Defines a single item used in a feature catalog - a reference to a list of features.

geometryType.description: GeoJSON RFC-7946 geometry type (Point, LineString, Polygon, MultiPoint, etc).

bbox.description: Array that is the bounding box coordinates as per GeoJSON

collectionMetadata.description: ISO 19115-2/3 or FGDC compliant meta-data for the collection.

contentType.description: Type of the data class accompanying the geographic data (e.g. HoldingResource, SiteResource).

featureCollection.description: The URL from which to fetch a GeoJSON feature collection.

resourceCollection.description: The URL from which to fetch a collection or array of non-spatial data items. Null if not supported.
